data.text:
Kevin Lee steps back Behind The Rope. Beverly Hills Shi Shi Shi!!!! The Man, the Myth, the Legend, the Icon. Never has a guest star on Housewives made such a splash with one sentence which became the tag line of his life with countless fans stopping him daily around the world to utter those three words, âshi, shi, shiâ.Â Kevin talks about how, although life changed as a result of his RHOBH appearance, he has had a successful wedding and event planning biz for a long time prior. Kevin talks celeb clients - Brad Pitt, Jennifer Aniston, Tom Cruise, Drew Barrymore, Oprah!, The Kardashians, working with billionaires who have no budget, wedding doâs and donâts, his special Kevin Lee flair and having the character Franck Eggelhoffer from Father of the Bride based on him.Â Of course, Kevin talks lifelong client and friend Lisa Vanderpump, throwing Pandoraâs wedding, planning Kyle Richards SoFi stadium âWhite Party"Â featured last season on RHOBH, the fall out between Kyle and LVP, Kyle and Mauricio, what Lisa Vanderpump told him about returning to RHOBH and much more.Â Of course, we also address that time he âfat shamedâ Katie Maloney on Vanderpump Rules and the world came for him.Â Kevin mentions it all in this epic, iconic chat which had us smiling from ear to ear! Part II starts now.

Introducing Bravo + Giggly Squad Star Paige Desorbo from LadyGang.

Follow the show: LadyGang

Bravo style superstar Paige Desorbo joins us to discuss her new book, "How to Giggle," her top podcast, "Giggly Squad," Trauma Bonds, Biological Clocks, and the Public's Plan for her Engagement. We also discuss Jojo Siwa, whether landing strips are still happening, Jac's new house drama, and because not all weeks can be good, Becca shares a heartbreaking bad week with our beautiful community.Â

While Tom Sandoval may be busy suing Ariana Madix and Ariana may be busy hosting the highest rated season ever of Love Island, rumors swirl about next season of Vanderpump Rules - will there be a new generation, reboot, cast change and / or not return at all. The Valley begins filming Season 2, we contemplate the potential return of Stassi or Rachel Leviss and have a real life run in update with Jax Taylor. Only in LA. Andy Cohenâs Bravo future comes into question again, Teresa and Jennifer Aydin continue to get called out by fans and RHONJ prepares to come to a season end with a long expected pause. All this and more as we are joined by the one and only Rob Schulte from the Vanderpump Robs Podcast!!

Monica Garcia steps back Behind The Rope. Reality Von Tease is in the house! The woman behind THE most exciting moment, season, scene, development in Housewives History since, well, Teresaâs table flip over a decade ago.Â Receipts, Proof, Timeline, Screenshots. We cover fu$king everything. Monica takes us through it all clarifying what were various still confusing timelines of how she went from fan to an actual bona fide breakout superstar Real Housewife on RHOSLC Season 4.Â We talk about the true facts behind her current âcooling offâ period, personal life, tumultuous relationship with her mom, upcoming RHOSLC Season 5, Dita Von Teese, rumors of a Lisa vs Whitney feud - again and where the once great, then not so great, then best season ever of Salt Lake goes next now that she is no longer part of the journey.Â Finally, bringing it back to where it all started, we break down the Jen Shah of it all, what she would say to Jen - and RHOSLC cast - today, what she would like to have happen in five years when Ms. Shah is expected to be a free woman and much, much more! Part II starts now.

Tom Sandoval sued Ariana Madix. The public, cast and everyone else destroyed Sandoval for his move. Sandoval withdrew the lawsuit. We break all of this down, sharing our thoughts on each move and where this mess stands now.Â Melissa Gorga is upset that Kathy Wakile shaded her on WWHL and explains her new thoughts and feelings on TheÂ Wakiles, RHONJ and this very toxic of seasons. New rumors about Ramona Singer have surfaced, Shannon Beador shades Nene Leakes and opens up about her DUI.Â Mauricio kissed a new woman who we know now is a model and influencer, Kyle removed âwifeâ from her IG bio and attended Morgan Wadeâs most recentÂ concert. Finally, Aurora Culpo slams Bethenny Frankel and shares a message for her, Paul and the world.
